inclusion.criterion: Female to male transgender men following penile reconstruction
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: On waiting list for insertion of inflatable penile prosthesis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing and able to provide written informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Transgender men prior to undergoing penile reconstruction
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Known urethral fistula or stricture that has not been treated
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Declines to be enrolled in trial
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Does not require a urethral catheter for clinical reasons
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has neurogenic bladder with indwelling suprapubic catheter and history of recurrent UTIs, but is currently asymptomatic. Urologist not concerned with leaking around cath site.
